sentences: Madison Elle Beer (born March 5, 1999) is an American singer and songwriter.
Born in New York, she began posting covers to YouTube in early 2012.
She released her debut single, "Melodies", in 2013.
In 2018, Beer released her debut EP, As She Pleases.
The following year, Beer signed with Epic Records, later releasing her debut studio album, Life Support in 2021.
As a member of the group she has released the internationally charting singles "Pop/Stars" (2018) and "More" (2020).

She has also appeared on television series such as Todrick (2015) and RuPaul's Drag Race (2020), and in the film Louder Than Words (2013).

Madison Elle Beer was born in Jericho, New York, on March 5, 1999.
Her family is Jewish, and she celebrated her Bat Mitzvah in 2012.
